description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 2, 3} mod 6.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1)
prog: (Haskell)a047246 n = a047246_list !! (n-1)a047246_list = [0..3] ++ map (+ 6) a047246_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 15 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
